content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) containing iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (-12.5, -48.5) configured to transfer iron ore from the chest to the furnace
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) intended to smelt iron ore into iron plates

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without available inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.

### Errors when placing entities with potential collisions
- Verify that there is enough space and no blocking entities before placing a new entity. Consider adjusting the spacing or changing the direction to avoid collisions.

### Errors with inserter setup not transferring items
- Double-check the alignment and configuration of inserters to ensure they are correctly positioned to pick up and drop items between entities.
